text: ยง 13-180 Monthly payments. A pension, a pension-providing-for-increased-take-home-pay, an annuity or a retirement allowance granted under the provisions of this chapter, shall be paid in equal monthly instalments or in ratably smaller amounts when the benefit begins after the first day of the month or ends before the last day of the month.

chapter.text: NEW YORK CITY EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT SYSTEM
